Title: Another Prick in the Wall
Plot: Using the battle for the bathroom as an opportunity to catch extra zeds, Martin falls foul of Sinead's pranks when she covers him in make-up while he's asleep. Unable to get to a mirror, Martin heads off to school unaware of his Boy George-esque look...
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Stephen Gillic, Norma Sheahan, Jessica Hynes, Johnny Vegas, Nuala Kelly, Pat McGrath
